Found a possible fix for the problem i'v been having,thought I'd share,perhaps help somebody else:Just change the desktop resolution to whatever resolution you use in-game before starting the game,as soon as I did that the frame rate issue disappeared.

Solution for Black Screen when startup game. Go to: ...Sniper Ghost Warrior 2Game_FastLoad and rename 2 files IntroMovies.pak, startup.pak to another name then start game again. Problem solved

Good luck :)
